data.eml:eml: A note on the new species of the genus Isopsera (Orthoptera: Phaneropteridae: Phaneropterinae) from India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nagar, Rajendra, Mal, Jhabar, Swaminathan, R. (2015): A note on the new species of the genus Isopsera (Orthoptera: Phaneropteridae: Phaneropterinae) from India. Zootaxa 3964 (1): 95-100, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3964.1.6
